data.title: 以至少 50 个字回答问题
data.content: "If you had to choose between starting your own business or studying at a university, which would you choose? Give specific reasons for your answer."
data.answer: I would choose to start my own enterprise. There can be many benefits to starting my own business. First, not everyone defines rewards the same way. For some, it might be seeing a new venture grow and succeed. For others, it may be conquering the unknown and striking out on their own. However, starting a new company might hold that promise for me. I can be my boss. When I start a business and am self-employed, I would ultimately control my own destiny. Whether you view starting a business as an economic necessity or a way to make some additional income, you might find it generates a new source of income. And I would have flexible hours. Owning your own business is hard work and often requires long, odd hours. In some cases, having your own business may allow you to have more flexible hours. Many stay-at-home parents, for example, choose to become entrepreneurs. (154 words)
